author: Matt Bassil
description:
What is the MTG Edge of Eternities release date? The fourth major Magic: The Gathering release of 2025 takes us to a whole new setting: space! That’s right, it’s a Magic space opera, featuring high-tech ships, fascinating planets, and graceful space beasts. You can see all the latest spoilers and news for this space fantasy release down below.

Continue reading MTG Edge of Eternities release date, Commander decks, and latest news
title: MTG Edge of Eternities release date, Commander decks, and latest news

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Wizards of the Coast has dropped the latest update to the ban list for Magic: The Gathering, and the axe has fallen on the most dominant strategy in Standard - Izzet Prowess. The overpowered 'Cori-steel Cutter' is banned, as is the format-warping combat trick 'Monstrous Rage'. Monstrous Rage's other home, Mono Red Aggro, has taken even more of a kicking, as the menacing mouse 'Heartfire Hero' is among five further cards to catch a ban in Standard.

Continue reading MTG's overpowered red cards get smashed with the ban hammer
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: MTG's overpowered red cards get smashed with the ban hammer

author: Matt Bassil
description:
I’m feeling a little bit smug, because while I was completely wrong with my tentative guess that Eevee Grove might not have much impact on the Pokémon Pocket meta, I was bang on when I predicted that Sylveon ex would be its most significant card. At least, that’s what the latest tournament results seem to show.

Continue reading This Pokémon Pocket tournament proves the new Sylveon card is busted
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: This Pokémon Pocket tournament proves the new Sylveon card is busted

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Eric Nagy may just have taken the crown as the best - or at least, the nerdiest - dad ever. This tiny Space Marine is his eight year old daughter, who “was all in” on the idea of cosplaying as Lieutenant Titus from Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2 as soon as she saw the helmet.

Continue reading Tiny Titus is the cutest Warhammer 40k cosplay ever
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Tiny Titus is the cutest Warhammer 40k cosplay ever

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Wizards of the Coast shared a new Dungeons and Dragons playtest document on June 26, but its contents don’t offer much to get excited about. Nine subclasses (seven old and two new) are presented for feedback here. Some strong ideas and welcome changes are present, but the design issues that do exist are distractingly egregious.

Continue reading New DnD playtest fumbles its roll for Monk and Fighter subclasses
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: New DnD playtest fumbles its roll for Monk and Fighter subclasses

author: Mollie Russell
description:
DnD skills summarise pretty much every ability a TTRPG character might need to use on their adventures. Whether you’re planning on looking, leaping, learning, or lying, there’s a matching skill to check with the roll of a d20. This guide explains all 18 skills, what they're for, and how to roll skill checks in your games.

Continue reading All DnD 5e skills explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: All DnD 5e skills explained

author: Timothy Linward
description:
DnD stats are the foundation of Dungeons and Dragons’ in-depth mechanics. When a creature wants to act, they’ll be called to make a dice roll, and their stats will modify the make-or-break results. A character's Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma help define what they’re good at, so understanding these six abilities is crucial for gameplay. If you need a quick Dungeons and Dragons stats reminder, this guide can help.

Continue reading DnD stats explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD stats explained

author: Mollie Russell
description:
What are the DnD classes, and how do they work? When you create a Dungeons and Dragons character, the first and most important decision to make is which of the 13 D&D classes you want to play. Your class is the mechanical core of your character and dictates which skills you're best at, both in combat and while adventuring. This guide draws on our team's 70 years of combined D&D experience to explain all 13 5e classes (and subclasses) in detail.

Continue reading All DnD classes and subclasses - a player's guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: All DnD classes and subclasses - a player's guide

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Flurry of Wings is in the midst of a pretty big price spike. This card was valued at $1.20 when the latest set dropped (and $0.70 before spoilers began, which should give you some clues). Now each one is worth $6. Meanwhile, shiny foil Flurries are even pricier and have risen from $3 to a fairly respectable $13.50. Yes, it’s definitely time to go digging through your old boxes to see if you’ve got a copy.

Continue reading 16-year-old MTG card that's perfect for new Final Fantasy commander spikes 400%
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: 16-year-old MTG card that's perfect for new Final Fantasy commander spikes 400%

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Atomic Mass Games (AMG) has revealed the rules from the upcoming ‘This is Rogue One’ squad pack for Star Wars: Shatterpoint, the last set of new miniatures it's releasing to be based on the ace 2016 Star Wars film Rogue One. Led by the spy Jyn Erso, this pack is all about cunning and completing your objectives at any cost.

Continue reading Star Wars Shatterpoint's new Rogue One squad pack uses cunning to triumph
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Star Wars Shatterpoint review, The best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion expansions guide
title: Star Wars Shatterpoint's new Rogue One squad pack uses cunning to triumph

author: Jasmine Mannan
description:
Elden Ring: The Board Game is due to get two new standalone expansions, publisher Steamforged Games has confirmed. Three years after the original was funded by 13,000 backers, Elden Ring returns to Gamefound with 'Machinations of the Witch' and 'Dominion of Rot'.

Continue reading The Elden Ring board game maps more of the Lands Between with new expansions
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best board games for adults, Our Elden Ring review
title: The Elden Ring board game maps more of the Lands Between with new expansions
